name: Chickpea Soup With Cumin and Lemon
recipeIngredient: 1 medium clove garlic, peeled and minced
2 1/2 cups chicken broth, homemade or low-sodium canned

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until softened but not browned, about 1 minute. Stir in the chickpeas, chicken broth, cumin, salt and pepper.

Put the mixture in a blender and blend until smooth. Scrape the mixture back into the saucepan and place over medium-low heat until hot. Remove from heat and stir in the lemon juice. Ladle into 4 bowls and serve immediately.
